text: haey nowpel banda anak del mean chomnue nung ayeat robsa yeung ban mokadl anaknoh chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol towkean puokke tha saum pheap sokhsand kaetmean dl puok anak . mcheasa robsa puok anak ban kamnt kdei me tda krounea leu khluon robsa trong . pitabrakd nasa anaknea knongchamnaom puok anak ban br pru td ampeuaeakrak daoy lngongkhlaw kraoyomk ke ban sarphap kamhosa ning ban kekhluon vinh banteabpi noh pitabrakd nasa a l laoh mha aphytosa mha anet sraleanh
